description: &2Ocean Monuments&r are underwater fortresses containing &cGuardians&r, &cElder Guardians&r, &3Prismarine Crystals&r and &3Sponges&r.
They can be found using &3Ocean Explorer Maps&r sold by &aCartographers&r.
&cGuardians&r are stone-like fish that fire charged &3lasers&r at the player, and can extend their spikes to &dreflect melee damage&r.
Each fortress is guarded by three &cElder Guardians&r, a boss-like variant of Guardians that inflict &3Mining Fatigue&r to all visitors.
&3Sponges&r can be placed to remove water in an area. They must be &3smelted&r before reuse.
